title: A Matter of Some Urgency
description: At the Cat Confederation's regular meeting in Darkway Alley, tempers fly and claws come out as Ming and the rest deal with a difficult problem for the fellowship.In this first book in the series, the reader meets Ming, the Abyssinian with the rhinestone color, the irascible old tomcat Smudge, Rex, the dog, and many others.The Cat Confederation stories draw on the best and worst of cat society to tell entertaining, engaging stories about the secret lives of our feline friends.Never cutesy or trite, the cats are real characters with depth and personality, and the plots are engaging and action packed.Download this short story for age ten and up and enjoy it today!
author: Jenni Liles (Maureen O'Danu)
